sentences: Kõigil asjaosalistel lasti suud tühjaks rääkida.
Eks nad või napsiklaasi juures suud puhtaks rääkida. Mõlemal pärast kerge.
context: The word 'tühjaks' is the adessive case form of 'tühi' (empty). It means to make something empty or to pour/empty out completely. In the context given, it's used with 'suud rääkida' (to speak), suggesting speaking one's mind fully and openly, as if pouring everything out. It can also be used literally for emptying containers.
